title: Audio Distortion Circuit
content: Audio effects are prevalent in music and range in purpose. While some are subtle and designed to clean-up signals, others add their own variations. One such effect is distortion.What is distortion?Distortion is an alteration that produces a “gritty” tone. It is typically achieved by increasing the gain of the audio signal until the peaks surpass the point of saturation. The video below demonstrates the how distortion affects a clean audio signal.UPDATES COMING SOON
